title: Allow configuration for the x:Bind compiler
body: x:Bind is great and I love it. But it would be even better if we could configure the compiler somehow through a special screen in the properties or through an optional configuration file.

comments.body:
With x:DefaultBindingMode we have already an approach. This item can be closed. Further suggestions for x:DefaultBindingMode are here:
https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-universal-windows-platform/suggestions/34797022-allow-x-defaultbindmode-on-app-element-in-app-xaml
